casebody.data:
Pardon C. RICKEY, as Receiver of the First National Bank of Mechanicville, N. Y., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. NEW YORK STATE NATIONAL BANK, Defendant-Appellee. No. 387. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 30, 1934. William T. Moore, of Mechanicvilie, N. Y., for appellant. Whalen, MeNamee, Creble & Nichols, of Albany, N. Y., for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment (— F. Supp. —) affirmed.
